BackstoryDef.title: Follower Acolyte
BackstoryDef.description: Born Edward Sallow, [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by the Followers of the Apocalypse after [PAWN_possessive] parents died. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth studying history, linguistics, and philosophy in the Boneyard, developing a sharp intellect and an obsession with ancient Rome.

BackstoryDef.title: Caesar
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] founded Caesar's Legion after being captured by the Blackfoot tribe. Using [PAWN_possessive] knowledge of Roman history and tactics, [PAWN_pronoun] united dozens of tribes under one banner. [PAWN_pronoun] is a brilliant strategist and charismatic leader, though [PAWN_pronoun] suffers from a brain tumor that causes periodic weakness.

BackstoryDef.title: Hidebarks Tribesman
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the Hidebarks tribe in the savage lands east of the Colorado River. As a youth, [PAWN_pronoun] witnessed [PAWN_possessive] tribe's brutal traditions and learned that strength and fear were the only currencies that mattered in the wasteland.

BackstoryDef.title: Legate
BackstoryDef.description: Known as the Monster of the East, [PAWN_nameDef] rose to become Caesar's most feared military commander. After personally executing [PAWN_possessive] entire tribe for cowardice, [PAWN_pronoun] joined the Legion and became legendary for [PAWN_possessive] brutality and unstoppable combat prowess. [PAWN_pronoun] leads from the front, breaking enemy lines through sheer violence.

BackstoryDef.title: Legion Recruit
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the earliest tribes assimilated into Caesar's Legion as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained in the ways of the Legion from a young age, learning discipline, tactics, and absolute loyalty to Caesar.

BackstoryDef.title: Praetorian Commander
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] commands Caesar's elite Praetorian Guard. [PAWN_pronoun] is a veteran warrior who has served the Legion for decades, earning [PAWN_possessive] position through unwavering loyalty and battlefield skill. [PAWN_pronoun] is responsible for Caesar's personal safety and the training of the Praetorian Guard.

BackstoryDef.title: Tribal Scout
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] showed exceptional intelligence and cunning from a young age. When [PAWN_possessive] tribe was absorbed by the Legion, [PAWN_pronoun] was selected for special training due to [PAWN_possessive] quick mind and natural talent for deception.

BackstoryDef.title: Frumentarius
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] leads the Legion's Frumentarii, the elite intelligence and infiltration corps. Known as "Mr. Fox," [PAWN_pronoun] is a master of espionage, sabotage, and psychological warfare. [PAWN_pronoun] operates behind enemy lines, sowing chaos and gathering intelligence for Caesar's campaigns.

BackstoryDef.title: Legion Youth
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in Legion territory and raised according to Caesar's strict code. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in military training and showed natural leadership abilities from an early age.

BackstoryDef.title: Centurion
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] earned the rank of Centurion through valor in battle. [PAWN_pronoun] commands a century of legionaries and is responsible for pacifying the Phoenix area. [PAWN_pronoun] is a skilled tactician and respected by [PAWN_possessive] troops for leading from the front.

BackstoryDef.title: Brutal tribal youth
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a harsh tribal environment where only the strong survived. [PAWN_pronoun] learned early that violence and intimidation were the keys to power.

BackstoryDef.title: Centurion at Nelson
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] commands Legion forces at Camp Nelson with ruthless efficiency. [PAWN_pronoun] is known for brutal tactics including crucifying NCR prisoners. [PAWN_nameDef] enforces discipline through fear and violence.

BackstoryDef.title: Legion conscript
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken into the Legion as a child during tribal assimilation. [PAWN_pronoun] adapted quickly to military discipline and showed tactical aptitude.

BackstoryDef.title: Centurion at Techatticup
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as Centurion overseeing Legion operations at Techatticup Mine. [PAWN_pronoun] manages slave labor and defends strategic mining positions with tactical precision.

BackstoryDef.title: Canyon survivor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up navigating dangerous canyons and learning to track and capture prey. These skills would later serve [PAWN_objective] well in a different kind of hunting.

BackstoryDef.title: Legion Slave Master
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as Centurion overseeing the Legion's slave operations at The Fort. [PAWN_pronoun] manages the capture, breaking, and assignment of slaves with cold efficiency. [PAWN_nameDef] views slaves as resources to be exploited.

BackstoryDef.title: Legion raised warrior
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised within the Legion from early childhood. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in combat training and absorbed Legion philosophy completely.

BackstoryDef.title: Centurion at Forlorn Hope
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] leads Legion raids against NCR positions, particularly targeting Camp Forlorn Hope. [PAWN_pronoun] is a skilled tactician who keeps NCR forces under constant pressure through coordinated attacks.

BackstoryDef.title: Wasteland enforcer youth
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up learning to enforce order through strength. [PAWN_pronoun] believed in harsh discipline and total obedience from an early age.

BackstoryDef.title: Centurion of Dry Wells
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] commands Legion forces at Dry Wells, enforcing Caesar's will with brutal efficiency. [PAWN_pronoun] is ruthless in combat and shows no mercy to enemies or incompetent subordinates.

BackstoryDef.title: Observant youth
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was always watching, always listening. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to gather information and read people's intentions before speaking.

BackstoryDef.title: Deep cover agent
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] operates as a Frumentarius embedded at Camp McCarran. [PAWN_pronoun] passes as an NCR civilian while gathering intelligence and sabotaging operations. [PAWN_nameDef] must maintain [PAWN_possessive] cover at all costs.

BackstoryDef.title: Swift messenger child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was always fast on [PAWN_possessive] feet and quick-minded. [PAWN_pronoun] delivered messages across dangerous terrain with speed and reliability.

BackstoryDef.title: Legion scout
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as a Cursor, a Legion scout and messenger. [PAWN_pronoun] explores ahead of Legion forces, gathering intelligence and relaying orders. [PAWN_nameDef] moves quickly through hostile territory.

BackstoryDef.title: Deceptive child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] learned early that lies and misdirection could be as effective as weapons. [PAWN_pronoun] practiced assuming different personas and hiding [PAWN_possessive] true nature.

BackstoryDef.title: Captured spy
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] operated as a Frumentarius until [PAWN_possessive] capture by the NCR. Now held at Camp McCarran, [PAWN_pronoun] faces interrogation while maintaining loyalty to Caesar. [PAWN_nameDef] knows too much to give up easily.

BackstoryDef.title: Legion youth
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in the Legion's training camps. [PAWN_pronoun] learned combat skills and tactical basics, preparing to lead small units.

BackstoryDef.title: Squad leader at Nelson
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] commands a contubernium (squad) at Camp Nelson. [PAWN_pronoun] enforces discipline among legionaries and coordinates small unit tactics. [PAWN_nameDef] aspires to earn promotion through battlefield performance.

BackstoryDef.title: Tribal warrior youth
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a tribe conquered by the Legion. [PAWN_pronoun] proved [PAWN_possessive] worth in combat and was selected for military training.

BackstoryDef.title: Decanus at Cottonwood Cove
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as Decanus at Cottonwood Cove, a Legion river outpost. [PAWN_pronoun] manages ferry operations and oversees security along the Colorado River approach to The Fort.

BackstoryDef.title: Beast handler child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up around dangerous wasteland creatures. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to understand their behavior and train them through a mix of discipline and reward.

BackstoryDef.title: Legion mongrel master
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] manages the Legion's mongrel war dogs at The Fort. [PAWN_pronoun] breeds, trains, and maintains these vicious animals used for guarding and combat. [PAWN_nameDef] understands his beasts better than most people.

BackstoryDef.title: Trader's apprentice
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a merchant family, learning the value of goods and the art of negotiation. [PAWN_pronoun] could spot quality weapons and armor from an early age.

BackstoryDef.title: Legion arms dealer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as the Legion's primary arms merchant at The Fort. [PAWN_pronoun] trades weapons, armor, and supplies with Legion members and approved visitors. [PAWN_nameDef] maintains good relations with Caesar's forces while turning a profit.
